mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, franchisee_id, statistics_type, statistics_time, total_amount, del_flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, franchisee_id, statistics_type, statistics_time, total_amount, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_profit_sharing_statistics where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_profit_sharing_statistics(tenant_id, franchisee_id, statistics_type, statistics_time, total_amount, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{franchiseeId}, #{statisticsType}, #{statisticsTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_profit_sharing_statistics(tenant_id, franchisee_id, statistics_type, statistics_time, total_amount, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.franchiseeId}, #{entity.statisticsType}, #{entity.statisticsTime}, #{entity.totalAmount}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into t_profit_sharing_statistics(tenant_id, franchisee_id, statistics_type, statistics_time, total_amount, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.franchiseeId}, #{entity.statisticsType}, #{entity.statisticsTime}, #{entity.totalAmount}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), franchisee_id = values(franchisee_id), statistics_type = values(statistics_type), statistics_time = values(statistics_time), total_amount = values(total_amount), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update t_profit_sharing_statistics
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
statistics_type = #{statisticsType},
statistics_time = #{statisticsTime},
total_amount = #{totalAmount},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
